detaileddescription.para: Position each character without adjustment. Best mode for printing.

Optimizes the position of each character within its space. Collisions are unlikely but characters may touch each other. Best mode to use when the screen needs to match what appears on the printed page.
The widths of the characters are chosen so that they never collide and rarely touch. Best mode for drawing small amounts of text.
Positions characters at a constant width. Best mode for fixed-width fonts.
Disable antialiasing. Used by BFont::Flags() and BFont::SetFlags().
Force antialiasing. Used by BFont::Flags() and BFont::SetFlags().
Truncate from the end of the string.
Truncate from the beginning of the string.
Truncate from the middle of the string.
Truncate while keeping each string unique.
ISO 8859-1 aka Latin 1 "Western European" font encoding.
ISO 8859-2 aka Latin 2 "Eastern European" font encoding.
ISO 8859-3 aka Latin 3 "South European" font encoding.
ISO 8859-4 aka Latin 4 "Northern European" font encoding.
Indicates that the font has been adjusted to look good on the screen.
Indicates that the font is non-proportional.

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of installed font families.

simplesect.para: The number of installed font families

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of styles available for a font family.

simplesect.para: The number of styles available for a font family.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the family name at the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: font_family String to receive the name of the family.
if non-NULL, the values of the flags IS_FIXED and B_HAS_TUNED_FONT are returned.

simplesect.para: A status code, B_OK on success or an error code.

parameterdescription.para: index does not correspond to a font family.

memberdef.argsstring: (font_family family, int32 index, font_style *name, uint16 *face, uint32 *flags=NULL)
memberdef.name: get_font_style

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the family name at the specified index.

detaileddescription.para: The face value returned by this function is not very reliable. At the same time, the value returned should be fairly reliable, returning the proper flag for 90%-99% of font names.

parameterdescription.para: String to receive the name of the family.
recipient of font face value, such as B_REGULAR_FACE.
if non-NULL, the values of the flags IS_FIXED and B_HAS_TUNED_FONT are returned.

simplesect.para: A status code, B_OK on success or an error code.

parameterdescription.para: index does not correspond to a font style.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the family name at the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: string to receive the name of the family.
if non-NULL, the values of the flags IS_FIXED and B_HAS_TUNED_FONT are returned

simplesect.para: A status code, B_OK on success or an error code.

parameterdescription.para: index does not correspond to a font style.

simplesect.para: true if the font list has changed, false if not.

briefdescription.para: BFont class definition, unicode_block class definition, and font-related struct and enum definitions.
